column5: I am planing a trip on Sept 28 - 27 in the Ottawa area, and would like to have some advice as to where I can best go fishing. I do not mind going to a lodge or resort, but am happy with a hotel. Equipment - 14' motorized canoe, pole. My wife will be with me so i am hoping the THIS TIME I can catch more than her. Species is not important, just good eating! Bass, pickerel, pike, or even good size panfish are fine. Thank you in advance.
if you just want to catch fish i would try the ottawa river.  its full of fish and every kind of fish can be caught!  Cheers!
Here's a recent Ottawa River report....fishndevil did the report and caught a lot of good eating fish!!!!  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...mp;#entry110279
